text: Alfie Hewett was the defending champion and successfully defended his Wheelchair Men's Singles tennis title at the 2019 US Open, defeating Stéphane Houdet in the final, 7–6(11–9), 7–6(7–5). ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Bracket=== == External links == * Draw Wheelchair Men's Singles U.S. Open, 2019 Men's Singles
title: 2019 US Open – Wheelchair Men's Singles
